## Koatty.getRequestHandler() method

Get a standard Node.js HTTP request handler for serverless/custom deployment.

Returns a `(req, res) => Promise<void>` function that can be used with: - Serverless platforms (AWS Lambda, Alibaba Cloud FC, etc.) - Custom HTTP servers (`http.createServer(handler)`<!-- -->) - Testing frameworks (`supertest`<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRequestHandler(protocol?: string): (req: RequestType, res: ResponseType) => Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

protocol


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Protocol type


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

(req: [RequestType](./koatty_core.requesttype.md)<!-- -->, res: [ResponseType](./koatty_core.responsetype.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;any&gt;

{<!-- -->Function<!-- -->} Standard Node.js request handler

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} If application has not completed bootstrap

## Example


```typescript
// Serverless deployment
const app = await createApplication(MyApp);
const handler = app.getRequestHandler();
export { handler };

// Custom server
const app = await createApplication(MyApp);
http.createServer(app.getRequestHandler()).listen(3000);
```
